articles.description: With the arrival of a new Dungeon in Destiny 2, Bungie has scattered a few collectibles across different encounters.
articles.content: With the arrival of a new Dungeon in Destiny 2, Bungie has scattered a few collectibles across different encounters. These are Eramis' voice recordings, as players get to hear her backstory through s… [+3118 chars]
